dcterms:creator: C. Ionescu
D. Papava
V. Olaru
C. Sminchisescu
dcterms:description: The H3.6M mocap dataset is the largest available human-skeleton motion dataset captured, which is appropriate for training deep networks with a huge number of parameters. It includes 15 actions performed by seven different actors, with each action recorded in multiple video sequences.
dcterms:title: H3.6m mocap dataset (H3.6M)
